mapper.insert: insert into zf_photo (id, photo_path_front, photo_path_center, photo_path_after, apply_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photoPathFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPathCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPathAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
